overview: A plastic bottle performs a tap dance, hopping up and down, tapping off wild rhythms like a Broadway dancer. At first glance, the bottle seems to be simply thrown around by gusts of wind, but as the dance intensifies, it becomes more and more apparent that the bottle is rebelling against the wind, not following it. Finally, the bottle leaps into a different space, which has subtly revealed its presence more than once during the dance but seemed so far from this bustle and flurry and the chiaroscuro on the concrete steps.
title: A Plastic Bottle's Stair Dance
